text: Captain January is a 1936 American musical comedy drama movie directed by David Butler and is the second adaption of the 1890 novel of the same name by Laura E. Richards. It stars Shirley Temple, Guy Kibbee, Slim Summerville, Buddy Ebsen, Sara Haden, June Lang, Nella Walker and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1936 drama movies Category:1930s comedy-drama movies Category:1930s American musical movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by David Butler Category:Movies set in Maine Category:1936 musical movies
title: Captain January (1936 movie)
